speaker: Nina
text: Did you see the feedback from QA? Several onboarding screens weren’t being rendered properly on older Android versions.
ipa: dɪd ju si ðə ˈfidˌbæk frəm ˌkjuːˈeɪ? ˈsɛvrəl ˈɔnˌbɔrdɪŋ skrinz ˈwɜrənt ˈbiɪŋ ˈrɛndərd ˈprɑpərli ɑn ˈoʊldər ˈændrɔɪd ˈvɜrʒənz.
linking: "feedback from" → /ˈfidˌbæk frəm/ (k + f linking), "being rendered" → /ˈbiɪŋ ˈrɛndərd/ (ŋ + r linking)

speaker: Dev
text: Yeah, the layout XML was corrupted during the last merge. It must have been overwritten by an older branch.
ipa: jæ, ðə ˈleɪˌaʊt ˌɛksɛmˈɛl wəz kəˈrʌptɪd ˈdʊrɪŋ ðə læst mɜrdʒ. ɪt məst həv bɪn ˌoʊvərˈrɪtən baɪ ən ˈoʊldər brænʧ.
linking: "layout XML" → /ˈleɪˌaʊt ˌɛksɛmˈɛl/ (t + ɛ linking), "been overwritten" → /bɪn ˌoʊvərˈrɪtən/ (n + o linking)

speaker: Dev
text: The fix has already been pushed, and a patch release is being prepared for tonight.
ipa: ðə fɪks hæz ɔlˈrɛdi bɪn pʊʃt, ənd ə pæʧ rɪˈlis ɪz ˈbiɪŋ prɪˈpɛrd fɔr təˈnaɪt.
linking: "been pushed" → /bɪn pʊʃt/ (n + p linking), "being prepared" → /ˈbiɪŋ prɪˈpɛrd/ (ŋ + p linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Good. Also, the animation on the welcome screen was removed, right?
ipa: ɡʊd. ˈɔlsoʊ, ði ˌænəˈmeɪʃən ɑn ðə ˈwɛlkəm skrin wəz rɪˈmuvd, raɪt?
linking: "animation on" → /ˌænəˈmeɪʃən ɑn/ (n + o linking), "screen was" → /skrin wəz/ (n + w linking)

speaker: Dev
text: Correct. It was considered too distracting, especially for accessibility compliance.
ipa: kəˈrɛkt. ɪt wəz kənˈsɪdərd tu dɪˈstræktɪŋ, əˈspɛʃəli fɔr ækˌsɛsəˈbɪləti kəmˈplaɪəns.
linking: "was considered" → /wəz kənˈsɪdərd/ (z + k linking), "too distracting" → /tu dɪˈstræktɪŋ/ (u + d linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Have the UI assets been optimized?
ipa: hæv ði ˌjuːˈaɪ ˈæsɛts bɪn ˈɑptəˌmaɪzd?

speaker: Dev
text: Yes, we had them compressed by the design team. All images were exported using new performance settings.
ipa: jɛs, wi hæd ðəm kəmˈprɛst baɪ ðə dɪˈzaɪn tim. ɔl ˈɪmɪʤɪz wɜr ɪkˈspɔrtɪd ˈjuzɪŋ nu pərˈfɔrməns ˈsɛtɪŋz.
linking: "had them" → /hæd ðəm/ (d + ð linking), "images were" → /ˈɪmɪʤɪz wɜr/ (z + w linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Perfect. And what about translation issues?
ipa: ˈpɜrfɪkt. ənd wʌt əˈbaʊt trænsˈleɪʃən ˈɪʃuz?

speaker: Dev
text: All string files have been reviewed, and we got the Korean version proofread by a native speaker before shipping.
ipa: ɔl strɪŋ faɪlz hæv bɪn rɪˈvjud, ənd wi ɡɑt ðə kəˈriən ˈvɜrʒən ˈprufˌrɛd baɪ ə ˈneɪtɪv ˈspiːkər bɪˈfɔr ˈʃɪpɪŋ.
linking: "been reviewed" → /bɪn rɪˈvjud/ (n + r linking), "version proofread" → /ˈvɜrʒən ˈprufˌrɛd/ (n + p linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Excellent. Just make sure a changelog is generated for the patch. Legal requires it before sign-off.
ipa: ˈɛksələnt. ʤəst meɪk ʃʊr ə ˈʧeɪnʤˌlɔg ɪz ˈʤɛnəˌreɪtɪd fɔr ðə pæʧ. ˈliɡəl rɪˈkwaɪərz ɪt bɪˈfɔr ˈsaɪnˌɔf.
linking: "changelog is" → /ˈʧeɪnʤˌlɔg ɪz/ (g + ɪ linking), "requires it" → /rɪˈkwaɪərz ɪt/ (z + ɪ linking)
